Ebonylife TV bụ ọwa telivishọn telivishọn nke Mosunmola Abudu, nke a makwaara dị ka Mo Abudu

E bu ụzọ gbasaa na DSTV na Julaị 2013, emesịa tinye ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na Septemba 2014.Ebonylife TV, mgbe ihe karịrị afọ ise nke mmekorita na afọ ojuju nke nhazi ọrụ ya na DSTV, kwụsịrị nhazi ya na DSTV na malitere ịgbasa ozi na netwọk Startimes n'August nke afọ 2018

Ebumnuche mmekorita ya na Startimes bụ iji kwalite ma melite ọdịnaya nke ndị na -ekiri ya na ndị debanyere aha n'Africa, yana ikwe ka ndị Naịjirịa na ndị na -ekiri ihe n'ozuzu nwee ọ enjoyụ ọrụ ahụ na ọnụ ahịa dị ọnụ ala karịa
Ebonylife TV bidoro na mmekorita ya na gọọmentị Lagos State na 2021, Ebonylife TV kwupụtara mwepụta nke Ebonylife Creative Academy, nke bụ maka ịkwalite ogo mmepụta ihe nkiri mpaghara
Ebonylife Creative Academy na -enye nkuzi dị mkpụmkpụ na ọkachamara na ihe nkiri, imepụta ọdịnaya mgbasa ozi, na mpaghara ndị ọzọ metụtara ya
Site na mbinye aka na Netflix, Ebonylife TV na mgbasa ozi ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Africa mbụ mere ya
N'ihi nke a, Netflix nwere ikike ugbu a maka ihe nkiri ọhụrụ nke Ebonylife TV mepụtara, dị ka Castle na Castle, n'etiti ndị ọzọ

A mara ọkwa na Machị 2018 na Sony Pictures Television (SPT) na EbonyLife TV nwere nkwekọrịta maka nkwekọrịta afọ atọ nke ga-agụnye mmekorita nke The Dahomey Warriors, usoro telivishọn banyere Amazons ndị lụrụ ọgụ megide ndị ọchịchị France na alaeze ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka nke narị afọ nke iri na itoolu. Ekwuputara ya na Jenụwarị 2020 na AMC Networks (USA) na EbonyLife ga -ejikọ aka na imepụta Naịjirịa 2099, ihe nkiri mpụ nke ọdịbendị ọdịbendị nke EbonyLife dere ma duzie
A mara ọkwa ọkwa mmekọrịta ọhụrụ n'etiti EbonyLife TV na Netflix na February 2020

Na mgbakwunye na usoro ihe nkiri Castle & Castle, Fifty, Sons of Caliphate, na 'On the Real', nnukwu onye na -asọ asọ zụtakwara ihe ngosi n'ezie, Egwuregwu Mmekọahụ, yana ihe nkiri, Royal Hibiscus Hotel, sitere na EbonyLife Entertainment

Ebonylife TV gbakwụnyere na ndepụta ihe ha rụzuru site na inweta ikike ịse ihe nkiri na Hushpuppi, onye ejidere n'oge na -adịbeghị anya maka itinye aka na aghụghọ, na mmekorita ya na Will Packer Productions na Universal Pictures.
Dị ka onye na -emepụta ihe nkiri pụrụ iche na ihe ịga nke ọma na mmemme telivishọn na Nigeria, Ebonylife Films egosila na ọ bụ azụmahịa na -aga nke ọma
Fim ndị Ebonylife mepụtara na -eme nke ọma na igbe igbe

Ihe nkiri izizi Ebonylife, Fifty (2015), bụ nnukwu ihe nkiri na-eweta nnukwu ego na Naịjirịa na 2015 na 2016. Na azụmahịa ihe nkiri Naịjirịa, The Wedding Party, ọrụ ọzọ nke Ebonylife Film, ghọrọ aha kacha ebubata oge niile, karịa
ọbụlagodi aha kacha aga nke ọma na Hollywood (Nollywood).
